Key Match Events: Ravi Bishnoi took 4 wickets in career-best figures
Tendai Chatara took 3 wickets and made a crucial catch to seal the win
Post-Match Reflections: Sikandar Raza was named Man of the Match
Zimbabwe's skipper Sikandar Raza praised his team's efforts and mentioned the support from the crowd
Shubman Gill said India bowled well but let themselves down in the field
Clive Madande said he tried to bat through and got 115 runs
Miscellaneous Highlights: India won the toss and chose to bowl first
Zimbabwe defended 115/9 to win by 13 runs
The game ended with Zimbabwe taking a 1-0 lead in the series
